Key:
(I had some free time, so I went to my room. Rinne
and Maria had just finished preparing dinner.)

(It's the first time I'd been in my room since I left
this morning. Before that phenomenon happened,
I would have been in my room.)
...I knew it.

(I was thinking about that moment from this morning
as I opened my desk drawer. There was a small bag
inside.)

(This was a key that Kotori gave me, saying I could
give it to someone... or it should have been.)

(Well, I guess that's what it was for. Or else this
place wouldn't exist. But...)

(I remembered. That this world was recreated. I met
Maria. And seeing Rinne, I remembered...)

(This key was what Rinne had forgotten. The one thing
that I gave Rinne. Proof of us being family.)

(I wonder if Rinne remembers our last conversation.
We decided that we're going to start over together.
But then Rinne disappeared, along with Eden.)

(Is this something I need to give Rinne once more?
But this may be something incredibly cruel.)
...What do I want to do?

(I don't think it's okay to remain in this world. But at
the same time, there's a part of me that cherishes
my days with Rinne and Maria. So I...)
Hey, Onii-chan! Everyone's ready!
...Okay, sorry. I'll be over right away!
(I shut my drawer and headed to the living room.)

Yoshino-chan, you're as cute as always～
What day of the week are you the cutest?

U-Uh... I don't know. Y-Yuzuru-san... how should I
answer...?

Instruction. Master Origami said so, too. There is no
moment where you are not cute. A woman will always
become cute for the person they love.
Whoa, Origami-chan is so cool! Yoshino, you should\nbe upfront, too!
Wh-What... What should I do...

I see... So this is the great black shield that shall
bring forth the ultimate heat. Soon the offerings will
be sacrificed...

Then why don't we try putting Kaguya onto the teppan
plate? Origami, please tie up Kaguya.
Leave it to me.

W-Wait a minute! I never said that I'd be the
offering!

If that's the case, please go over there and hang out
with the others. I can't pour the oil on the plate.

G-Got it! Hehehe... I shall silently wait for tonight's
supper.
Then Maria, I will tie this up and take it outside.
Feel free to do so.
WHYYYYYYY?!

Hahaha. It's so lively in here. Rinne-oneechan, you
want more plates?

Hehe, it really is. Oh, I think I'm good on the plates.
If we put any more, it'll be too crowded. We can
always replace the used plates later.
That seems better, considering the amount of people.

Hmm, if there are this many people... This is pretty
crazy.

(Not only are the morning people here, we also have
Origami and Kurumi as well. Something feels off,
but... Oh.)

Hey Kotori, what happened to Reine-san? She usually
drops by on days like this.

Ohhh, Reine? She said that since Origami's here,
she thought it best to not come～
Ah, makes sense.

(Unfortunately, since Reine-san is school faculty,
Origami wouldn't understand what's going on. It
would be difficult for Reine to come over.)

Shido, there's so much food and so many people.
This is great!

Yeah, this may be a first. But don't forget that this
is a celebration of Rinne's return, okay? Tohka, you
were the one that brought it up.

Yeah, I know! It looks like we can eat a lot of yummy
food!
(Tohka, were you really listening to me...?)

We're all ready, Onii-chan! Now you do the toast as
the master of the house!
Okay, okay, got it. Leave the rest to me.
(Well, I'm not the master of the house or anything.)

But Rinne, would you say something before I do my
toast?
What... Me?
Who else? We're all gathered here for you.
U-Um... Well, then.

Everyone, thanks for gathering for my sake. I would
love to actually become friends with you all this time
around.

(Rinne's words made me stop breathing. Those words
seemed really cruel for Rinne. It's as if she were
saying that her connection with everyone was fake.)

(I looked over at Maria and our eyes met. Maria smiled
as if she were troubled. I knew we couldn't help it.
We were the only ones who knew.)

Hm? What are you talking about, Rinne? We're already
friends, aren't we?

Oh... You're right. Thanks, Tohka-chan. Well, it's a
pleasure, you guys.
Yeah!

You are an obstacle I must overcome. You can't just
leave for no reason.

...It's a pleasure. You... are always taking care of me,
Rinne-san.
Rinne-chan, it's a pleasure!

Rinne-san, it's a pleasure. When you are here, the
people surrounding Shido-san become more
interesting. It's truly entertaining.

You seem to lack the mindset of a proper slave.
You cannot escape me even if you wanted to... I
can't believe you haven't realized that yet.

Declaration. Yuzuru and Kaguya both see you as a dear
friend.

Rinne-san, we've been friends from the moment we
met. You're such an adorable girl.

Hmm... It would be nice if you would also speak to me
casually, Rinne.
Everyone... Thank you so much. I'm so happy.

(I think everyone's response is their honest feelings.
Seeing everyone today makes me feel that way.)
All right, then let's do this! Cheers!
Cheers!

(And just like that we cast away the sentimental vibe
and started our party.)
All right, let's cook some meat next.

Tohka-san, it's not good to only eat meat. You need
to have a balanced meal.

Tohka Yatogami is eating too much meat. At this rate,
she'll definitely turn into a pig.

A p-pig?! That can't be... Hey, wait a minute, Origami
Tobiichi! This is beef... It wouldn't turn me into a pig,
right?
...I can't even talk to you.
My, my, looks like she's drained the poison.
Yoshino-chan, Kotori-chan, I cooked this.
Yayyy, meat～
Th-Thank you.

*Nom, nom*. This is really delicious. I would say this
suits me very well.
Clarification. Is that a joke...? Hehe.

Joke, what are you talking ab... Oh. Th-That's not it!
That was totally a coincidence!
Wry laugh. Kaguya, your sense is disappointing.
GRRRR! I told you it wasn't intentional!

(I thought it would be more chaotic, but it seems like
everyone is doing well with each other.)
Shido, are you eating?

Yeah. How about you, Rinne? You're the guest of
honor today, but you're working too hard.

Don't worry about me. I like doing this. And more than
anything... I'm just glad everyone is having a good time.
Yeah. I'm surprised.
Maybe everyone is doing this for my sake.
Hm? What do you mean?

Normally Tohka-chan and Tobiichi-san flock around you
immediately, right? But today, it wasn't like that.
Oh, I see. Then let's switch, Rinne.
Huh? What do you mean?

Go mingle with everyone. You want to be their friend,
right?

Okay, I'll take you up on your offer. Can you take
over, Shido?
Leave it to us. I will help, too.
That's fine, but don't answer for me...

Thanks you two. I'm going to go hang out with
everyone, then.
All right, have fun.
Shido, you're so kind.

Wh-Where is that coming from? You're making me
blush.
But you totally don't understand a girl's heart.
What are you talking about?

Nothing. Let's take over Rinne's position and do it
well.

(I nodded and started to move. Rinne seemed to be
talking with Tohka and the girls already.)

I see. Tohka-chan, you want to improve your cooking
skills, too?

Of course! That way I can make delicious things, and
I can cook for Shido, right?
Right. If you're serious, then I'll help you, okay?
Rinne Sonogami, if that's the case, may I join?
I don't mind... But why?

It's important to grab someone by the stomach. And
besides, to be quite honest, the idea of letting Tohka
Yatogami get there before me rubs me the wrong way.

What did you say?! You always say just what you want,
don't you?!

It's a personal opinion. You have no right to tell me
I can't feel this way.
Hey, Tohka-chan, Tobiichi-san, please calm down...

(Rinne is trying way more than before. Seeing her
talking to them made me smile.)
Shido... You seem happy.
Huh? Haha... Do I really?

Yes. I see that staring at girls from afar makes you
grin like that.
B-But the way you put it is...!

(...I can't tell if she's doing it on purpose or if
she's just oblivious like that. I gave a big sigh before
going back to washing the dishes.)
